hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash GIT_USER="I-am-a-robot" GIT_EMAIL="huawei_ci_bot@163.com"
if [ -d "website" ]; then rm -rf website fi
replace() { local src=$1 local dest=$2
path=$dest/docs if [ ! -d "$path" ]; then echo "$path is not existing, going to create it." mkdir -p $path fi
menu=$dest/menu if [ ! -d "$menu" ]; then echo "$menu is not existing, going to create it." mkdir -p $menu fi
rm -r ${path}/* cp -r $src/* ${path}/
mf=${path}/index.md test -f $mf && mv $mf $menu
find $path -name "*_index.md" | xargs sed -i 's/\(\[[^[]*\](\)\.\.\([^[]*\).png/\1.\2.png/g' find $path -name "*_index.md" | xargs sed -i 's/\(\[[^[]*\](\.\.\)\([^[]*\)\/_index.md/\1\/docs\2.html/g' find $path -name "*_index.md" | xargs sed -i 's/\(\[[^[]*\](\.\.\)\([^[]*\).md/\1\/docs\2.html/g'
find $path -name "*.md" | xargs sed -i 's/\(\[[^[]*\](\.\.[^[]*\)\/_index.md/\1.html/g'
find $path -name "*.md" | xargs sed -i 's/\(\[[^[]*\]([^:[]*\)\.md/\1.html/g' }
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then git config --global user.email $GIT_EMAIL git config --global user.name $GIT_USER
git clone https://gitee.com/openlookeng/website.git if [ -d "hetu-docs/en" ]; then
replace hetu-docs/en ./website/content/en-us/docs
echo "hetu-docs/en to en-us/docs copyed." fi
if [ -d "hetu-docs/zh" ]; then replace hetu-docs/zh ./website/content/zh-cn/docs
echo "hetu-docs/zh to zh-cn/docs copyed." fi
cd website
if hash docker 2>/dev/null; then docker build -t web:v0.0.1 . if [ "$?" -ne "0" ]; then echo "build website error... the process will be exited." 1>&2 exit 1 fi docker rmi web:v0.0.1 else echo "docker is not installed, don't do build test." fi
echo "udpate the product docs successfully" else echo "git has not been installed." fi
if [ -d "website" ]; then rm -rf website fi
cd .. if [ -d "hetu-core" ]; then rm -rf hetu-core fi
